short_description: This building block is used in Use Case 2 (Drug Synergies Screening) to merge the features extracted by CARNIVAL for each cell line with the original cell line features, in order to produce a final csv file that can be used for prediction with the JAX Drug Prediction building block.
long_description: This building block is used in Use Case 2 (Drug Synergies Screening) to merge the features extracted by CARNIVAL for each cell line with the original cell line features, in order to produce a final csv file that can be used for prediction with the JAX Drug Prediction building block.

default.name: input_dir
default.description: Path containing the folders with the samples. Name of the folders are used for the name of the samples

default.name: feature_file
default.description: File containing a list of features. If provided, only those features are retrieved from solutions

default.name: merge_csv_file
default.description: Join the merged features into the given file

default.name: merge_csv_index
default.description: Column ID used as the index for the data (e.g. sample)

default.name: output_file
default.description: Output file with the features, where rows are samples and columns features
